newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Midas Printing posts 1st interim results.
newsitem.headline: Midas Printing posts 1st interim results.

text.p: Company name Midas Printing Group Ltd
NOTE - Midas, engaging in commercial, magazine, newspaper and book printing, was listed on the Stock Exchange on June 12, 1996.
Net is after an exceptional gain of HK$2.82 million on interest income of the subscription monies received in respect of flotation in June.
